body: this issue was fixed in rocm-5.0.0 release but the previous releases would require this patch. The issue is fixed in the upstream llvm project which i have taken as a patch for 4.2.0 till 4.5.2 release. I have tested the build for 4.3.0,4.3.1 as well as 4.5.0 releases. This should fix #28906
title: Apply cyclades removal patch for the llvm-amdgpu package
